text:
Ronald Bilius "Ron" Weasley (1980-?) is a fictional character from the "Harry Potter" stories.
Story.
He is a red-haired child with freckles. He comes from a poor background. He lives at The Burrow with his family of nine people. He is the youngest son in his family. He was a humorous and loyal boy. He wishes he had money. He is the sixth of seven children born to Molly Prewett(Molly Weasley) and Arthur Weasley, with five brothers and one sister, Ginny. He is Harry Potter's best friend.
It is revealed in later books, that Ron is romantically interested in Hermione Granger. The two are hinted to be romantically involved in the Deathly Hallows.
In movies, he is played by actor Rupert Grint. Ron marries Hermione and they have two children: Rose Weasley and Hugo Weasley. He is the manager of the joke shop Weasley's Wizard Wheezes.
